"Whose Heart Are You Breaking Tonight?" is a song written by Ted Murry and Benny Davis and performed by Connie Francis.
Overview
"Whose Heart Are You Breaking Tonight?" was released as a single in 1964 and reached No. 7 on the U.S. easy listening chart and No. 43 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It also charted in Australia. The song was included as a track on Francis's 1965 album, Connie Francis Sings "For Mama".
It was translated into Italian as "Un altro amore" and was the B-side to her Italian single "Ho bisogno di vederti".
